comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content:
My photo from ninety years later (taken 1996), from about the same point.  You can see how the glacier has receded over that time.

[http://flickr.com/photos/curiouskiwi/3086762/]

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Thanks Brenda!

I read (in that vague, somewhere, some-time-ago kind of way) that scientists were studying paintings of sunsets to measure air pollution over time. Photos like these make such interesting  comparisons.

-- Courtney
